Description: 1988 Made in Japan Charvel Jackson Model 6 Bound Body & Neck Neck Thru Guitar Husk Project. Pearl White Factory Finish. 24 Fret Neck Scale. Floyd Ready Tremolo. Condition - Frets are in excellent played condition overall. Light signs of playwear. Frets have tons of life left on them. Fretboard is in excellent shape as well. Front headstock is in great condition. Minor chipping on back pointy tip of headstock. 2 tiny dings in finish on back edge of headstock as well. Back of neck play area is in excellent condition. Back of body has a few light dings in finish, very minor. Front body has a few noticeable nicks and dings in finish that are pictured in the listing photos. Tiny nick/scratch mark in finish below tremolo route not pictured in photos. No cracks or chips in tremolo post mounting holes. No nicks or dings in tremolo route. No buckle rash at all. Guitar husk is in overall excellent played condition with the exception of the wear listed above and pictured in the photos. I would give the husk an overall 8 out of 10 for its condition. No modifications done to guitar. No cracks or damage around neck joint area that meets body. No cracks or any damage on guitar. Guitar husk is in good to great used condition overall with the exception of the wear listed above. Neck is straight. Truss rod is fully intact and works fine with no issues. Husk will be carefully packed and wrapped in a sturdy soft case gig bag and shipped in a strong cardboard guitar box. I have shipped these guitar husks all over the world and they have always arrived safe and undamaged. Guitar is being sold as a project because there are no parts included with guitar. Check my feedback rating. Please review all pictures and read entire description before asking any questions that may have been answered in listing and prior to making an offer. Serial Number - C800339 Body Wood - Neck Thru Design with Poplar Wings Finish - Pearl White Weight - 5lbs 10.8oz Scale Length - 24.75" Guitar stand is not included!!!
